org.jclouds.trmk.ecloud
Interface TerremarkECloudAsyncApi

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable, TerremarkECloudAsyncClient, org.jclouds.trmk.vcloud_0_8.TerremarkVCloudAsyncClient
Deprecated. The async interface will be removed in jclouds 1.7. 

@Deprecated
public interface TerremarkECloudAsyncApi
extends TerremarkECloudAsyncClient

Provides access to eCloud resources via their REST API.

Author:
Adrian Cole
